name: CONTRACTOR 3D
description:
Notice:

This game has been significantly compromised by hardware issues encountered during development.  Expect many bugs and issues.

Use  [ and ] to change mouse sensitivity in  game.  They're between P and \ on your keyboard.

--

GET PSYCHED!

Blake 0010 0000 is a rare breed of robot; designed to drive motor vehicles that have since been outlawed, he struggles to fit in with the rest of a more tame and stationary society in various desk jobs.  One night, as another server outage wrecks his brain at a bad moment, he makes the call: it's time for one last joyride.

Plunge headfirst into the local security station and steal yourself an old-fashioned forklift in a bizarre Wolfenstein 3D inspired FPS.

CONTRACTOR 3D was made in roughly 2.5 days for TobuJam under the theme "SMASH."

CONTROLS

W and S or UP and DOWN : Move Forward/Back

A and D : Strafe

LEFT/RIGHT or MOUSE HOR : Turn

Mouse 0 : SMASH / OPEN / FIGHT

E : Enter/Exit Forklift

[  and ] : Change Mouse Sensitivity
